record.title: RECOVERY REBATES AND ECONOMIC STIMULUS FOR THE AMERICAN PEOPLE ACT OF 2008--MOTION TO PROCEED
record.narrative:
RECOVERY REBATES AND ECONOMIC STIMULUS FOR THE AMERICAN PEOPLE ACT OF 2008--MOTION TO PROCEED -- (Senate - February 05, 2008)

[Page: S655]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate resume consideration of the motion to proceed to H.R. 5140, the economic stimulus bill.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
If not, the question is on agreeing to the motion.
